about_the_game:
GRAAG is a 3D collection adventure. Explore nature and abandoned buildings, collect samples of animals, plants and technology, and find out what happened to the world!

Features:
  • 3D graphics with real-time gameplay
  • Procedurally generated world with forests, lakes, and buildings you can go into
  • Dozens of animals, plants, rocks, and others!
  • Collect fur and blood samples from animals, leaf and berry samples from plants and more!
  • Find clothes to shield yourself from the elements, to be able to go to zones with a lower temperature
  • Drop off the samples to earn money.

A mysterious person has sought you out, and you are to travel through nature and abandoned laboratories and factories to take samples of everything you can find, in order to advance humanity. Or so they say.

name: GRAAG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
